## {.tabset .tabset-fade}
Test about stations, include map 

<div align="center">
### Precip
```{r,results='asis', echo=FALSE}
library(rbokeh)
      figure(width = 800, height = 400) %>%
        ly_bar(as.factor(Year), 'Total Precip (in)', data = tempTable, hover = TRUE, fill_color="green") %>%
        theme_axis("x", major_label_orientation = 90)
```

### Temp 
```{r,results='asis', echo=FALSE}
library(rbokeh)
      figure(width = 800, height = 400) %>%
        #ly_lines(Year, 'Avg Temp (F)', data = tempTable, color="orange") %>%
        ly_points(Year, 'Avg Temp (F)', data = tempTable, hover = TRUE, fill_color="red") %>%
        theme_axis("x", major_label_orientation = 90)
```
</div>
